remarks: A well-founded relation has no 3-cycle loops.  Special case of Proposition 6.23 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2015.)
statement: fr3nr $p |- ( ( R Fr A /\ ( B e. A /\ C e. A /\ D e. A ) ) -> -. ( B R C /\ C R D /\ D R B ) ) $.
